record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2054
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 2054 -- (House of Representatives - May 13, 2008)

[Page: H3753]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SCHULTZ, WASSERMAN
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I seek unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H.R. 2054, the Universal Service Reform Act of 2007. My name was listed due to a clerical error.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from Florida?
